text: Music, art, theater. I'm just a big fan of beauty.
author: Jerry Hall

text: There's a sadness to the human condition that I think music is good for. It gives a counterpoint to the visual beauty, and adds depth to pictures that they wouldn't have if the music wasn't there.
author: Mike Figgis

text: The idea that happiness could have a share in beauty would be too much of a good thing.
author: Walter Benjamin

text: I remember reminding myself that beauty is an opinion, not a fact. And it has always made me feel better.
author: Hayden Panettiere

text: The thought came to me that all one loves in art becomes beautiful. Beauty is nothing but the expression of the fact that something is being loved. Only thus could she be defined.
author: Robert Musil
